mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for McNain, Archibald
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Bethel, Clairmont Co., Ohio [Bethel, Clermont County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: McNain, Archibald Patient Age: 30. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture arm. Location Wounded: Oldtown, MD. Date Wounded: 1864/08/02. Nature of Wound: Buckshot. Result: Returned to duty. Terms of service having expired. Not cured.
